title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing.
OB: Upon resizing the window in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted to avoid excessive flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing excessively.
